ComicInfo.Summary:
Returning from her last adventure, Robyn is back in New York, and looking for some sort of normalcy. But not everyone feels she deserves any, the universe included. After a close friend is attacked, Robyn must take it upon herself to get to the bottom of this mystery as she is pitted against her greatest adversary yet, when she becomes public enemy number one, to the city she calls home. Don't miss this fast paced bare-knuckle, new series, Robyn Hood: Outlaw!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sean Chen & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Riveiro & Ceci de la Cruz | 4 | E | Cover E | Leonardo Colapietro | 5 | F | Cover F | None | 6 | G | Subscription Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Eric Basaldua | Missing | H | St. Paddy's Day Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Mike Krome (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | I | St. Paddy's Day Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Mike Krome (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | J | Wizard World Philly Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Eric Basaldua (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | K | Wizard World Philly Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Eric Basaldua (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
